channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-13353] LdapGroupsMapping getPassward shouldn't return null when IOException throws
item.description: When IOException throws in getPassword(), getPassword() return null String, this will cause setConf() throws java.lang.NullPointerException when check isEmpty() on null string.
item.summary: LdapGroupsMapping getPassward shouldn't return null when IOException throws

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

This message was automatically generated.

The fix looks good to me. Thanks liangvls@gmail.com for the contribution.
Would you also like to add a regression test?

I see that when the IOException is thrown, the log message does not preserve its stacktrace. Could you also update the fix to include the stacktrace?
Basically, change it to:

    catch (IOException ioe) {
      LOG.warn("Exception while trying to get password for alias " + alias + ": ", ioe);
    }
Thanks liangvls@gmail.com for the initial patch. I created a v02 patch based on the initial one, adding a regression test, removed redundant code and improved error logging.

the test failure is unrelated. The mvnstyle error is due to an unrelated issue.
Hi liangvls@gmail.com could you review the patch? Or fee free to submit a patch directly. Thanks!
It LGTM. +1. Thanks weichiu
Committed this to trunk, branch-2 and branch-2.8. Thanks eddyxu for reviewing it and liangvls@gmail.com for contributing the patch!

weichiu, Branch 2.8 is failing to compile after commit for this jira

[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin:3.1:testCompile (default-testCompile) on project hadoop-common: Compilation failure

I am not able to revoke the jira, hope you can take care of it or else i can raise a new jira!
Naganarasimha thanks for reporting this! I'll revert this commit now.
Attach version 2.8 patch
Thanks for the patch weichiu, Seems to pass when i test locally. Will wait for jenkins run and commit it!
Committed it to Branch-2.8
Thanks!
